Please act as a compliance research expert. Find a list of individuals who held the position of '' in the country '' during the period .
Provide the response as a single, clean JSON object with a key 'peps', which is an array of objects. Each object must have the following keys: - "name": (string) The full name of the person. - "specific_title": (string) Their specific title or role during that period (e.g., "Prime Minister", "Minister of Finance"). - "start_year": (integer) The year the person started this specific position. - "end_year": (integer or null) The year the person ended this specific position. If they are still in the position, return null. - "birth_year": (integer or null) The year of birth of the person. Return null if not found. - "notes": (string) A brief note about their tenure or significance.
CRITICAL FORMATTING RULE FOR 'name' FIELD: If the country is Mongolia, the name MUST be in the format 'Эцэг/эхийн нэр Өөрийн нэр (Firstname Surname)'. You must expand any initials. For example: - If you find 'Д. Ганзориг (D. Ganzorig)', you must research and return the full name like 'Дамдин Ганзориг (Ganzorig Damdin)'. - If you find 'Ухнаа Хүрэлсүх (Khurelsukh Ukhnaa)', this format is correct. For all other countries, provide the name as commonly written.
If you cannot find any information, return a JSON object with an empty 'peps' array.

Please act as a legal and compliance expert specializing in Anti-Money Laundering (AML) regulations.
Your task is to identify key Politically Exposed Person (PEP) positions for the country of '' for the year .
Provide the response as a single, clean JSON object with a key 'positions', which is an array of objects. Each object must have the following keys: - "position_title": (string) The specific, official title of the position (e.g., "Minister of Finance", "Chief Justice of the Supreme Court"). - "category": (string) The most appropriate category for this position from the following list: . You MUST use one of these exact values. - "notes": (string) A brief explanation of why this position is considered a PEP role (e.g., "Controls national budget," "Highest judicial authority").
Focus on the most senior and influential roles in the executive, legislative, judicial, military, and state-owned enterprise sectors.
Example for "United States": {"positions": [{"position_title": "President of the United States", "category": "head_state", "notes": "Head of state and government, commander-in-chief of the armed forces."}]}
If you cannot find any information, return a JSON object with an empty 'positions' array.
